name: Dark World
description: There is a state name Lusius. The inhabitants of Lusius are living there piecely and happyly. But there is only a problem, often domestic animals and human are caught by monsters for eating. Suddenly the amount of monsters is growing incredibly. So the monsters need more food. Then a large number of domestic animals and human are caught. Monsters also destroy many living houses. Then no one dare to fight to the monsters. Only a boy name Jekob come out to fight to the monsters. Now you have to rule as Jekob. Can you save Lusius and it's inhabitants?
